Website accompanying the publication [*A brain precursor atlas reveals the acquisition of developmental-like states in adult cerebral tumours*](https://doi.org/10.1038/s41467-022-31408-y).

The code used for the core processing of the developmental data can be found on [github](https://github.com/BenSimonsLab/Hamed_Nat-Commun_2022).
